name: AITH - Ace In The Hole
description:
For LOWREZJAM 2022 (themes: Ace In The Hole, You Are The Last Hope)

...There may be bugs...

Plot:

While the card crook is preparing to cheat, he does not suspect that there is a massacre in his marked deck.

The cards decided to find out who is worthy of the title of Ace in the Hole!

Like a true Spade, you cannot yield to the hated Diamonds.

Prove that you are a worthy Ace in the Hole and save the cunning one, because you are his last hope for victory!

Assets:

"Engine" by kaboom.js (https://kaboomjs.com/)

Graphics by Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/).

Sounds by jsfxr (https://sfxr.me/)

Music by Jonathan So (https://jonathan-so.itch.io/)

update 1.1 - 04.08.2022

Add teleport on Right Mouse Button Click, that consume 3 Rank.
